timeline.bodyText: We don't need all these different versions of third party libraries! Please just use the latest one that is already there ... and if I were doing this, I would attempt to remove the older versions. Anything that uses a version of SLF4J 1.7 should work just fine with the latest bug fix version; it might even work better!
timeline.author: tevans78

timeline.bodyText: MP 4.0 features should only depend on other MP 4.0 features. In this case, please change the dependency to MP Config 2.0.
timeline.author: tevans78
